title: Why I Changed My Mind On These 3 Theological Views | Unapologetic 83
itunes:title: Why I Changed My Mind On These 3 Theological Views | Unapologetic 83
description: Have you ever changed your perspective on a theological matter? I know I have, and Bobby has as well. Bobby will reveal three positions he has shifted on over the years.
